STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Explore a World of Culinary Possibilities
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Stay Hungry for New Food Adventures
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: What our satisfied users are saying about building foods with our app
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has revolutionized my cooking experience. I can easily construct meals that are both delicious and nutritious.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a professional chef, I'm always on the lookout for innovative culinary tools. This app delivers, allowing me to craft unique dishes with precision.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I love how this app breaks down the construction of food into simple steps. It's perfect for teaching my kids about healthy eating.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our app for creating delicious foods
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What kinds of foods can I build with this app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app allows you to craft virtually any type of food imaginable. From hearty main dishes to decadent desserts, you can bring your culinary visions to life with our powerful food building tools.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Do I need special equipment or ingredients?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Not at all! Our app is designed to work with common kitchen tools and readily available ingredients. We provide substitution suggestions if you're missing something.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How difficult is it to use the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: We've made the app incredibly user-friendly. With simple step-by-step guides and intuitive controls, anyone can start building amazing foods, regardless of skill level.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I share my food creations?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Absolutely! You can upload photos and recipes for your unique food builds. Our community loves seeing and trying new culinary masterpieces.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is there a way to get expert cooking help?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, our app connects you with a network of professional chefs who can provide personalized tips and feedback to take your food building skills to the next level.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Our app simplifies recipe planning and cooking for busy foodies.
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Introducing a revolutionary way to build your meals.
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Our intuitive app guides you through creating mouth-watering dishes from scratch. Explore new recipes and elevate your culinary skills.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_2_BODY_TEXT_4: Get recipe recommendations personalized for you
FOOTER_COMPONENT_3_BODY_TEXT_3: Get cooking tips from fellow foodies
FOOTER_COMPONENT_3_BODY_TEXT_4: Find inspiration from around the world
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: FoodBuilder is a powerful app that empowers you to design and create your own delectable dishes. Unleash your culinary creativity and bring your food ideas to life with our intuitive tools and vast ingredient library. From quick snacks to elaborate multi-course meals, FoodBuilder is your ultimate companion for building mouthwatering recipes.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Our easy-to-use interface allows you to effortlessly create and customize recipes for any dish you can imagine.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Access our comprehensive collection of ingredients from around the world to craft unique and flavorful meals.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Detailed, step-by-step directions ensure that even novice cooks can follow recipes with confidence and ease.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Easily find recipes tailored to your specific dietary needs, whether vegan, gluten-free, keto, or any other preference.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Share your culinary creations with friends and fellow food enthusiasts, and read reviews to discover new favorite dishes.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Automatically generate shopping lists based on your chosen recipes, making meal planning and grocery shopping a breeze.
CTA_BODY: Craft mouthwatering dishes with our intuitive app for building and exploring delicious recipes.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Craft mouthwatering meals with our intuitive app.
SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Explore a world of culinary possibilities
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Let's discuss creating delicious digital dishes
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: Vibrant fruits and veggies for essential vitamins and minerals
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: Nutrient-dense bases like quinoa, brown rice and whole wheat
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: Lean meats, eggs, legumes for protein to build and repair
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_4: Nuts, seeds, oils for energy and promoting healthy cells
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_5: Fresh and dried herbs and spices to add aroma and flavor
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Low-sodium broths, vinegars, citrus to enhance taste
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Food Building App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What kinds of foods can I build?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: With our app, you can construct virtual models of all types of foods - from simple snacks to elaborate multi-course meals. Let your creativity run wild!
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How realistic are the food models?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Our app utilizes advanced food rendering technology to create photorealistic 3D models with accurate textures, colors, and shapes that look just like the real thing.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I share my food creations?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely! You can share your culinary masterpieces with friends, family, or the entire food building community through our online gallery and social sharing features.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is the app free to use?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: The basic app is free to download and use. However, we offer optional premium ingredients and tools through in-app purchases for an enhanced food building experience.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Source locally grown fruits, veggies, and artisanal products for your creations.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Unleash your inner chef with recipes from around the world.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Share your dishes and discover new flavors from fellow food enthusiasts.
